string-array.name: RunningText1
string-array.item: Do you already have an account?
Are you ready to change your life?
Sign in to use it.

string-array.name: RunningText2
string-array.item: You do not have a guest account yet, right?
Apply, what are you waiting for?
And your life will improve.

string-array.name: RunningText3
string-array.item: Sign-up User
Or
Sign-up Maid

string-array.name: RunningText4
string-array.item: If you forget your password
Please provide your registered email address.
Password reset will be sent by email.

string-array.name: RunningText5
string-array.item: Male
Or
Female

string-array.name: RunningText6
string-array.item: We send an SMS with a code to the number.
Then the system will check
For further login.

string-array.name: RunningText7
string-array.item: You do not have a maid account yet, right?
Apply, what are you waiting for?
And the housewife herself will have more jobs.

string-array.name: RunningText8
string-array.item: Take a picture of your ID card.
Then upload
Wait a moment to move on to the next step.

string-array.name: RunningText9
string-array.item: Take a picture of your profile.
Then upload
Wait a moment to move on to the next step.
